pp1.4:16.1_0: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism and put at the right time, repeatedly examining and scrutinizing, and scrutinizing the confidence of those deserving of criticism.
pp1.4:17.1_0: After examining and scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism and consideration, and considering them in line with the teaching.
pp1.4:18.1_0: There is a person who criticizes those deserving of criticism at the right time, truthfully and substantively. But they don’t praise those deserving of praise at the right time, truthfully and substantively.
pp1.4:18.2_0: There is a person who praises those deserving of praise ... But they don’t criticize those deserving of criticism ...
pp1.4:18.3_0: There is a person who criticizes those deserving of criticism at the right time, truthfully and substantively.
pp1.4:19.1_0: one who lives off the fruit of initiative, but not deeds; and who lives off the fruit of good deeds, and not initiative; and there’s no fruit of deeds.
pp1.4:2.1_0: a bad person has even more good people.
pp1.4:20.1_0: the dark bound for darkness, the dark bound for light, the light bound for darkness, and the light bound for light.
pp1.4:21.1_0: one sunk low who rises high, one who rises higher, and one who rises high.
pp1.4:23.1_0: There are those whose estimation of and based on form.
pp1.4:24.1_0: shabby, wearing coarse things, and fine words.
pp1.4:25.1_0: One who practices to benefit themselves, but not others,
pp1.4:25.2_0: One who practices to benefit others, but not themselves.
pp1.4:25.3_0: There is a person who practices to benefit both themselves and others.
pp1.4:25.4_0: There is a person who practices to benefit neither themselves nor others.
pp1.4:26.1_0: One person mortifies themselves, committed to the practice of mortifying themselves.
pp1.4:26.2_0: One person mortifies others, committed to the practice of mortifying others.
pp1.4:26.3_0: One person mortifies themselves and others, committed to the practice of mortifying themselves and others.
pp1.4:26.4_0: And when people don’t mortify either themselves or others, committed to the practice of not mortifying themselves or others.
pp1.4:26.5_0: living without wishes in the present life, extinguished, cooled, experiencing bliss, having become holy in themselves?
pp1.4:27.1_0: The greedy, the hateful, the delusional, and the conceited.
pp1.4:28.1_0: When a person has serenity but not discernment, they don’t get discernment.
pp1.4:28.2_0: When a person has discernment but not serenity, they don’t get serenity of heart.
pp1.4:28.3_0: While they have both serenity and discernment.
pp1.4:28.4_0: There is a person who has serenity but not discernment.
pp1.4:29.1_0: The person who is goes against the stream, stands on the far shore, and has crossed over,
pp1.4:30.1_0: Little learning and not get the point of learning.
pp1.4:31.1_0: the confirmed ascetic, the white lotus ascetic, the pink lotus ascetic, and the exquisite ascetic of ascetics.
pp1.4:4.1_0: worse, good character, and bad character.
pp1.4:5.1_0: The blameworthy, the mostly blameworthy, the slightly blameworthy, and the blameless.
pp1.4:6.1_0: One who understands immediately, one who understands after detailed explanation, one who needs personal training, and one who merely learns by rote.
pp1.4:7.1_0: One who speaks on topic, but not fluently. They’re fluently on topic, but they don’t fluently fluently fluently fluently fluently fluently on topic, and they don’t speak neither on topic nor fluently.
pp1.4:9.1_0: Four persons like the windy clouds.
